item.description:
What's New in 0.7.0

  • Enhance OpenAIOAuthProvider to include ChatGPT-Account-Id in request headers
  • Add localized strings for Deepgram, OpenAI, OpenRouter, and DeepL features
  • Add support for DeepL translation and enhance OpenAI OAuth settings
  • Update options sidebar ideal width to improve layout consistency
  • Refactor BatchTranslationService to use dynamic batch size based on provider; add LLMModelPicker for streamlined model selection in VoiceTypingSidebar and TranscriptionSidebar
  • Add global keyboard shortcuts for clear transcription and toggle overlay in MenuBarView
  • Refactor MainView to use AppStorage for sidebar visibility and update help text with keyboard shortcuts
  • Enhance Streaming Translation Service with Sentence-Level Caching and Improved Diarization Handling
  • Add sentence-level click-to-highlight in bilingual dictation view
  • Add .worktrees/ to .gitignore
  • Remove deprecated UserDefaults.synchronize() usage and update documentation (#126)
  • Add localization support for various components and improve FFmpeg installation instructions (#124)
  • Add localization support across the application (#123)

What's New in 0.6.1

  • Refactor update check button to use a label for better accessibility
  • Add English localization support to build scripts and update Info.plist
  • Add localization support for various components and improve FFmpeg installation instructions (#124)
  • Add localization support across the application (#123)

What's New in 0.6.0

  • Add localization support for various components and improve FFmpeg installation instructions
  • Add localization support across the application (#123)

item.title: 0.6.0-beta.3
item.description:
What's New in 0.6.0-beta.3

  • Add localization support across the application
